data.message: I cannot send messages on messenger. Reported a problem and still nothing but a generic response. Can someone help me please?

replies.message: Hey Monika. It's possible that you have been temporarily blocked from sending messages. This could be because you sent too many messages in a short amount of time, or because some messages you've sent were marked as spam or abusive content. To learn more about messaging blocks, visit our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2zckGhk. -Kiara

Facebook  I already reported it. No answer. So how long does the block usually last? What can I do? I was supposed to meet someone to buy something and I can't message them.
Thanks
